```{r}
lowResponse <- blockData %>% select(State,County, Block_group, Mail_Return_Rate_CEN_2010 , Low_Response_Score) %>% na.omit(cols = 4:5)
View(lowResponse)
summary(lowResponse)

```
```{r}
install.packages('devtools')
library(devtools)

```
```{r}
library(usmap)
countyLow <- blockData %>% select(State,County, Mail_Return_Rate_CEN_2010) %>% mutate(
  fips = paste0(State, County),
  State = NULL,
  County = NULL,
  returnRate = Mail_Return_Rate_CEN_2010,
  Mail_Return_Rate_CEN_2010 = NULL) %>% na.omit(cols = 2)

stateLow <- blockData %>% select(State, Mail_Return_Rate_CEN_2010) %>% transmute(
  fips = State,
  returnRate = Mail_Return_Rate_CEN_2010) %>% na.omit(cols = 2) #take mean of group by state data
plot_usmap(regions = "counties",
           data = stateLow,
           values = 'returnRate')
            labs(title = "US Counties",
                 subtitle = "did it!.")
```
